news.title: Google Starts Rolling Out Better AMP URLs
news.description: In a much anticipated move, Google is changing the way its Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) display URLs. Rather than display an “http://google.com/amp” URL, as the search engine has done for AMP pages since their inception, it will now show the URL of the publisher of the page (the same behavior as regular website pages).

news.title: Google My Business Lets Users Create Custom Short URLs
news.description: Google is rolling out a change for users of Google My Business that will allow them to create custom short URLs for their listings. Once a user has set this up, they can direct visitors to their profile page using a URL like “g.page/[yourcustomname]”.
